title: Hydro Innovation Summit
description: A two-day showcase of adaptive infrastructure prototypes, panels, and community tours.

title: River Guardian Fellows Launch
description: Orientation for the new cohort of River Guardian Fellows with lab demonstrations.

title: Civic Data Commons Workshop
description: Hands-on training for building privacy-first dashboards using the Civic Data Commons.

title: River Schools Leadership Residency Info Session
description: Meet faculty mentors and alumni from the Leadership Residency program.

title: Floating Clinic Commissioning
description: Celebrate the launch of two new clinic vessels with tours and health screenings.

title: Winter Riverwalk Light Festival
description: Interactive art installations created by River Arts students with live performances.

title: Telehealth Equity Framework Webinar
description: Public health researchers present the new telehealth equity framework and implementation toolkit.

title: Civic Tech Challenge Finals
description: Finalist teams pitch privacy-first civic apps to community judges.

title: River Youth Mentorship Kickoff
description: Meet mentors, partner school leaders, and youth participants in the mentorship network.

title: Resilience Scholarship Celebration
description: Honor recipients of the new resilience engineering scholarship and hear their project plans.
